assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Yamato Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells OA equipment parts, SP products, logistics equipment, housing and automotive equipment, amusement related parts, household goods, information communication goods, and home appliance parts in Japan and internationally. The company offers various OA products, such as copier, fax, printer, sorter, and liquid crystal display device parts; livingware, including refrigerator and washing machine parts, housing garbage disposers, battery cases for power tools, and various food containers; and water purifier filters. It also provides automotive parts comprising thermo sensor parts, mudguards, and fog light garnishes; housing equipment related products consisting of unit bath parts, mirror cabinets, civil engineering and construction materials, acrylic processed products, polycarbonate plates, and fence parts; and resin materials, such as resin pellets and plastic plate materials. In addition, the company offers logistics equipment parts, including roll box palettes, box pallets, hand tracks, mesh pallets, storage racks, dolly products, hand truck products, plastic containers, foil trays, and part transport trays, as well as various pallets; and premium products comprising mobile phone goods, clocks, stationery, and other amenity goods. Further, it provides display products consisting of display wagons, cosmetic trays, pamphlet stands, illumination and moving signs, and PM vans; and façade, pole, stand, and protruding signboards. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Kawagoe, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Kotaro  Nagata
